title: Little Old Mrs. Pepperpot
description: LITTLE OLD MRS PEPPERPOT Waking up one morning to find you've shrunk to the size of a tiny pepperpot isn't an ordinary, everyday event for most people - but then Mrs Pepperpot is a very extraordinary person! When she's around little things can turn into great big adventures - especially when they involve getting stuck in a draw full of macaroni. . .
author: Alf Pr√∏ysen
